body: You worked in one of your goddess's temples as a sacred courtesan, and you know how to flatter, please, and (most of all) listen. You gain a +1 trait bonus on Sense Motive checks and Diplomacy checks to gather information, and one of these skills (your choice) is always a class skill for you.
name: Divine Courtesan
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Traits/Religion Traits/Divine Courtesan
